thread.title: MOVES-Mariano Giralt to head BNY Mellon global tax services team
thread.title_full: MOVES-Mariano Giralt to head BNY Mellon global tax services team | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: MOVES-Mariano Giralt to head BNY Mellon global tax services team
text:
Aug 18 Bank of New York Mellon Corp appointed Mariano Giralt the head of its global tax services operations.
Giralt, who joined the company four years ago, previously led its tax services team for Europe, Middle East and Africa region. (Reporting by Anannya Pramanick in Bengaluru)
